CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__AdjustmentAmount__c > 0 , TRUE, IF(AND(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Gross_Settlement_fee__c = 'Yes', Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.APT_Rate_Card_Edited__c ), IF( AND(Apttus_Config2__UsageRate__c - 0.1 != Apttus_Config2__PriceOverride__c,Apttus_Config2__UsageRate__c != Apttus_Config2__PriceOverride__c) , TRUE, FALSE),IF(Apttus_Config2__UsageRate__c != Apttus_Config2__PriceOverride__c , TRUE, FALSE)))
CustomField.label: Highlight changes
